doc:
Steve Brodie (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Brodie_(actor) 0 Steve Brodie (born John Stevenson; November 21, 1919 – January 9, 1992) was an American stage, film, and television actor from El Dorado in Butler County in south central Kansas. Born John Stevenson, he took his screen name from Steve Brodie, a daredevil who claimed to have jumped from the Brooklyn Bridge in 1886 and survived. Steve_Brodie ( born John_Stevenson ; November_21_,_1919 – January_9_,_1992 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor from El_Dorado in Butler_County in south_central_Kansas . Born_John_Stevenson , he took his_screen_name from Steve_Brodie , a_daredevil who claimed_to_have_jumped from the_Brooklyn_Bridge in 1886 and survived .
